channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US travelers scramble to adjust as airlines cut flights because of shutdown
item.description: Anxious travelers across the U.S. felt a bit of relief as airlines mostly stayed on schedule while gradually cutting flights because of the government...

item.title: WATCH: Pres. Trump says 'only a foolish person' would be against ending the filibuster

item.title: Government shutdown updates: Schumer outlines Dems' offer to reopen government
item.description: The Senate is in session Friday, but Majority Leader John Thune has given no clear indication of what direction they'll take on votes.

item.title: James Watson, co-discoverer of the double-helix shape of DNA, has died at age 97
item.description: Scientist James Watson, who shared a Nobel prize for helping discover the double-helix shape of the DNA molecule, has died

item.title: James Watson, co-discoverer of the shape of DNA, dies at 97
item.description: James D. Watson, who helped discover the structure of DNA, has died at 97 years old.

item.title: Trump administration seeks to block full SNAP payments for November
WATCH: Airlines begin canceling hundreds of flights due to shutdown-related FAA reductions
item.description: The cancellations are the latest -- and perhaps biggest -- disruption to air travel since the government shutdown began more than a month ago.

item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: Food costs are up, but your Thanksgiving feast will cost less this year
item.description: Although grocery prices have continued to climb in 2025, a Thanksgiving dinner will cost 2% to 3% less this year, one analysis found.
